activities: People who want to take surveys to earn rewards will complete profiling questions to facilitate TapResearch to match them with appropriate surveys for which they qualify.  These profiling questions include age, gender, zip/postal code, marital and employment status and various other things like pet ownership, home ownership and parental status.  Users start to answer these questions after selecting to take a survey from within a mobile application or website. Users are required to accept our privacy policy to continue, and are easily able to navigate to the Privacy Policy to read it in full.
eucountries: France, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: Respondent information that includes device characteristics (automatic) and answers to survey questions manually input by the respondent.
privacyprograms: We are members of the market research associations CASRO and ESOMAR.
recoursemech: Our independent recourse mechanism is: CASRO Safe Harbor Program (https://www.casro.org/?complaintcasrosh)
